wholesale.title: Welcome to the Wholesale Side of FlexyStore
wholesale.welcome: If you’re in the market for wholesale pre-poo spray, this is the place to be because we’re rooting for your success! In an FlexyStore partnership, you can count on receiving the manufacturer’s price. You can count on us to collaborate with you on custom order that better serve your clientele. Plus, you can count on us to share our best practices and tips for creating an eye-catching in-store display.
wholesale.welcome2: Most importantly, you can count on us to provide transparency and complete professionalism, always. We’re always honest about our products & services and share information on industry bestsellers because we believe successful business partnerships are built on honesty and trust.
wholesale.verProductosDesc: Get to know our product catalog and what opportunities we have for your business. To start an order, you must register an account.
wholesale.verCatalogoDesc: In the meantime, please get to know our product catalog and what opportunities we have for your business.
wholesale.gracias: Thank you for registering with FlexyStore. One of our sales representatives will be reaching out to you within 72 hours to provide you with your login information.

registracion.instrucciones: By completing this form, your data will be sent by email to an FlexyStore manager to approve your registration request. You will receive an email with your login details to enter the system for the first time. When you enter you will have to change your password.

pageAbout.title: How it works
pageAbout.subtitulo: It’s never been easier to poop like nobody’s smelling.
pageAbout.bajada: Meet FlexyStore, the anti-awkward, pre-poo spray that will make you feel comfortable whenever and wherever you poop.
pageAbout.parrafo1: We’ll be the first to admit we’ve pooped in public restrooms, left behind reeking odors, then scurried away because we didn’t want to face the person who went in the stall after us—it’s definitely not our proudest moment. We pooped at friends’ homes, used air freshener, then realized the poo smell was still hanging out way more times than we’d like to count. (We still feel embarrassed from having to warn others to let the bathroom air out before use and from walks of shame in public restrooms.)
pageAbout.parrafo2: The truth is, no matter where we went or what we did we always felt ashamed and embarrassed by our poo.
pageAbout.parrafo4: We decided enough was enough, and FlexyStore was born. We created a pre-poop spray that eliminates odors as soon as poo falls into the toilet. Without any lingering stench, all that’s left behind is refreshing fragrance.
pageAbout.misionBajada: Our mission is to give you the courage to poop confidently whenever, wherever.
pageAbout.misionParrafo1: That means discreet packaging so you can fit FlexyStore in your purse, backpack, or pocket for anywhere on the go. It means pleasant and powerful fragrance that needs as little as two sprays to eliminate and replace poo fumes. With odors locked away in the toilet, you’ll have poop anonymity so you never have to feel self-conscious again.
pageAbout.misionParrafo2: FlexyStore is cruelty-free, made with a 100% essential oil base, and made in the USA.
pageAbout.quienesomosParrafo1: FlexyStore is one of Mar Company’s fragrance product brands. Established in 2013, Mar Company is an aromatic product manufacturer, supplier, and distributor located in Miami, Florida.
pageAbout.quienesomosParrafo2: Our product catalog includes essential oils, scented sachets, oil diffusers, and so much more. With nearly a decade of experience to our name, we continue to craft and perfect our range of scented products to provide you, our trusted partners, the highest quality fragrance wholesale there is.

instrucciones.slayDesc: The awful poo stench dies as soon as poo hits the water. Go ahead and poop like nobody’s smelling!
instrucciones.hoorayDesc: Now that that’s done, you can leave the bathroom confidently. No more walks of shame!
instrucciones.terms: I accept Terms of Use & Conditions

checkout.msgExito: We will send you the details of your purchase by email
